benefits.sectionDesc: Focus on what matters – we handle the rest

howItWorks.title: In 14 Weeks, Your Business Runs on Autopilot

step1.title: STEP 1
step1.subtitle: Strategy Call & Content Brief
step1.description:
We hop on one call to understand your services, brand, and goals.
Then we send you a super simple form (content brief) - no writing needed, just bullet points or voice notes.
step1.note: No need to write website text or design anything — we extract it all from you.

step2.title: STEP 2
step2.subtitle: We Design, Write & Build Everything
step2.description:
Our team writes all the copy, designs the pages, and builds the full website.
You just relax. We'll send you a preview once it's ready.
step2.note: We do 100% of the work. You don't have to touch a thing.

step3.title: STEP 3
step3.subtitle: Launch + AI Assistant Setup
step3.description:
Once you approve the website, we launch it.
If you choose the AI assistant, we also train it on your services and plug it into your site or WhatsApp.
step3.note: You now have a website and AI assistant working 24/7 without hiring anyone.

pricing.limitedSpots: Limited spots each month — personalized attention guaranteed.

onTime.title: On Time
onTime.description: Your website or AI system will be live within the promised timeline — no delays, no excuses.

professional.title: Professional and Secure
professional.description: Your website and AI are built with industry best practices — secure, reliable, and professional.

noHiddenFees.title: No Hidden Fees
noHiddenFees.description: What we quote is exactly what you pay — no surprises, no extra costs.

scarcity.title: If You Wait...
scarcity.subtitle: Every day without a professional website costs you opportunities

questions.question: How long does it take to launch my website?
questions.answer: We typically deliver a fully functional, high-converting website in just 14 days, so you can start attracting clients fast.

questions.question: Do I need to provide content or design ideas?
questions.answer: No worries — we handle branding, copywriting, and design for you. You just approve the layouts and content along the way.

questions.question: Will my website work on mobile and desktop?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Every site is fully responsive, optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop, so your clients have a seamless experience everywhere.

questions.question: Can I add AI features to my website later?
questions.answer: Yes! Our optional AI automation systems can be integrated anytime to automate bookings, follow-ups, and client engagement.

footer.description: Premium branding and AI automation for modern businesses based in Paris & Prague.
